Text: I downloaded the file but there are so many i dont have a clue what to do with them.  Can someone please help me

legacy, You have to download and install Power ISO 4.7 which is listed above as: TO USE .iso FILES DOWNLOAD THIS. I've used this program for a long time and it works well.

If you are new to .iso's then you are in for a learning process. 

The MS Office file is an .iso file and Power ISO will open it up and the way I use it is to either burn it to a DVD (RW) or install it on a flash drive. Just click on the setup.exe and it will install the program.
